Package Users

Class PointsSystem

java.lang.Object
Utility.CSVReader
DataManager.UserDBManager
Users.PointsSystem
public class PointsSystem extends UserDBManager
The PointsSystem class provides methods for managing and retrieving points for users in the system.

    • getCurrentPoints

      public static int getCurrentPoints(User user)
      Retrieves the current points for a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user for whom to retrieve points.
      Returns:
      The current points for the user, or -1 if the user is not found or does not have points.
